name: Sidharath Metal
overview:
Established in the year 1977, we, “Sidharath Metal Corporation”, are engaged in dealing and stocking a vast array of Stainless Steel ERW, Seamless Pipes & Tubes, Sheets & Plates, Round Bars, Flanges, Pipe Fittings and Other Steel Products. Also, we offer Copper and Brass Pipes, Tubes, Sheets, Round Bars, Flats, Wires etc.

Our Quality: Being a quality conscious organization, we strive to maintain high quality standards in our products & policies. The products offered by us are sourced from vendors of high repute who use high-grade material in the manufacturing process.

Infrastructure: We have a sound infrastructure. Our spacious warehouse has the capacity to store large quantities of products. We possess a team of experts who are sourcing products of international standard to keep abreast with the global markets. Our quality professionals have served as a beacon not only for us but also for the entire industry in establishing top-notch quality standards.

Vendor Base: We are in association with some of the reputed vendors of market to offer superior quality products to clients. These vendors with whom we are in collaboration, use quality-approved material to manufacture the offered products.

Our Team: Procuring agents Quality controllers Warehousing experts Sales & marketing executives

Client Satisfaction: Being a customer-oriented organization, we aim to maximize the satisfaction level of our esteemed clients in the best possible manner. Due to this reason, we make sure that superior quality products are offered to at industry-leading prices.
